titleStmt.title: The resolution of this case of conscience whether the Church of England's symbolizing so far as it doth with the Church of Rome, makes it unlawful to hold communion with the Church of England?
titleStmt.author: Fowler, Edward, 1632-1714.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills, Jun., for Fincham Gardiner ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Fowler. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
